creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Virgin and child in mandorla; floating angels aloft holding a crown suspended above Virgin's head; Virgin stands on a crescent
marks:
Signature, Mark

in grahite: 17148 monogram in block, upper left: [AA]
provenance: Paul Davidsohn; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Virgin Crowned by Two Angels
